```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
opts_knit$set(root.dir ="~/DTSC/Manufacturing_Projects/csv")
```

## R Markdown
```{r}
master <- read.csv("Master_Facility_FINAL.csv")

naics <- master %>% 
  count(NAICS_CODES) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```

```{r}
unique <- as.character(naics$NAICS_CODES)
unique <- paste0(unique, collapse=", ")
unique
```


```{r}
write.csv(naics, "~\\DTSC\\Manufacturing_Projects\\csv\\naics.csv", row.names=FALSE) 
```


```{r}
th=theme_bw(base_size=10)+theme(strip.background= element_rect(fill="white"))

plot1 <- ggplot(naics, aes(x=NAICS_CODES)) + geom_boxplot() +th
plot1
```
